message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.NE 

This paper discusses a novel approach for intrinsic motivation in reinforcement learning, specifically using positive affect as a reward signal. This falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG) as well as computer vision (cs.CV) since the approach is evaluated on downstream computer vision tasks. Additionally, the paper discusses the use of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and robotics (cs.RO) in implementing the approach. Finally, the paper also discusses the use of neural networks (cs.NE) in training the intrinsic reward function.
